short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple highlighter with data storing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Homer is a companion to https://oread.pw Which is a simple utility to collate URLs that people read and also highlighted content.

It's much simpler to save content from articles around the web with this tool. The UI and feature is made super simple. So, that the extension only does this specific thing.
